TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IcmpV4Statistics extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供本地计算机的 Internet 控制消息协议 IPv4 (ICMPv4) 统计数据。

span.span: Provides Internet Control Message Protocol for IPv4 (ICMPv4) statistical data for the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMPv4 是一组错误和使用 Internet 协议版本 4 的信息性消息。ICMPv4 is a set of error and informational messages for use with Internet Protocol version 4. IETF RFC 792 中定义了 ICMP 版本 4。ICMP version 4 is defined in IETF RFC 792. 使用此类方法以返回 ICMPv4 流量信息。This class is used by the method to return ICMPv4 traffic information. ## Examples 以下示例显示当前 ICMPv4 统计信息。The following example displays the current ICMPv4 statistics. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#6)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数可以仅由派生的类名为。This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property AddressMaskRepliesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long AddressMaskRepliesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“地址掩码应答”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Address Mask Reply messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的“地址掩码应答”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Address Mask Reply messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 地址掩码请求和答复消息用于确定在本地子网的子网掩码位数。Address Mask Request and Reply messages are used to determine the number of bits in the subnet mask for the local subnet. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DestinationUnreachableMessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long DestinationUnreachableMessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取由于数据包的目标中存在无法访问的地址而接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4) 消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) messages that were received because of a packet having an unreachable address in its destination.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的“无法到达目标”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Destination Unreachable messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法到达目标的消息可以发送到任何以下原因是数据包的源计算机：A Destination Unreachable message can be sent to the computer that is the source of a packet for any of the following reasons: - 在计算机找不到的目标地址的路由。The computer cannot find a route to the destination address. - 从管理上禁止与目标地址的通信。Communication with the destination address is administratively prohibited. 例如，防火墙会阻止数据包的传递到目标。For example, a firewall prevents delivery of packets to the destination. - 无法访问目标地址。The destination address is unreachable. - 无法访问目标端口。The destination port is unreachable. 例如，没有可用于数据包的协议的任何侦听器。For example, there is no listener available for the packet's protocol. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#23)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#23)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#23)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DestinationUnreachableMessagesSent As Long
public: abstract property long DestinationUnreachableMessagesSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取由于数据包的目标中存在无法访问的地址而发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4) 消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) messages that were sent because of a packet having an unreachable address in its destination.

value.span: 值，指定发送的“无法到达目标”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Destination Unreachable messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法到达目标的消息可以发送到任何以下原因是数据包的源计算机：A Destination Unreachable message can be sent to the computer that is the source of a packet for any of the following reasons: - 在计算机找不到的目标地址的路由。The computer cannot find a route to the destination address. - 从管理上禁止与目标地址的通信。Communication with the destination address is administratively prohibited. 例如，防火墙会阻止数据包的传递到目标。For example, a firewall prevents delivery of packets to the destination. - 无法访问目标地址。The destination address is unreachable. - 无法访问目标端口。The destination port is unreachable. 例如，没有可用于数据包的协议的任何侦听器。For example, there is no listener available for the packet's protocol. - ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#23)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#23)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#23)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property EchoRepliesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long EchoRepliesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“回送应答”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Echo Reply messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的 ICMP“回送应答”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of number of ICMP Echo Reply messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回送请求和回显回复消息，计算机可以从网络上的远程计算机请求的 ICMP 响应。Echo Request and Echo Reply messages allow a computer to request an ICMP response from a remote computer on a network. 此功能通常用于确定远程地址的有效性。This functionality is often used to determine the validity of remote addresses. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#21](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#21)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#21)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#21)]

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的 ICMPv4 消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMPv4 messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发送的 ICMPv4 消息进行通信错误以及有关使用 Internet 协议版本 4 (IPv4) 发送数据包的信息。ICMPv4 messages are sent to communicate errors and information about packets that were sent using the Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4). ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#20)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#20)]

value.span: 一个 值，指定已发送的 ICMPv4 消息的总数。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发送的 ICMPV4 消息进行通信错误以及有关使用 Internet 协议版本 4 (IPv4) 发送数据包的信息。ICMPV4 messages are sent to communicate errors and information about packets that were sent using Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4). ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#20)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ParameterProblemsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long ParameterProblemsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“参数问题”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Parameter Problem messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的 ICMP“参数问题”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Parameter Problem messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数问题消息发送时的主机或路由器在处理数据包标头，例如，遇到了无效的 IPv4 选项或无效的下一标头类型的内容时遇到问题。Parameter Problem messages are sent when a host computer or router encounters problems while processing the contents of a packet header, such as encountering an invalid IPv4 option or an invalid Next Header type. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#27](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#27)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#27)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#27)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property RedirectsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long RedirectsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4) 重定向消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Redirect messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的 ICMP 重定向消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Redirect messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由路由器发送重定向消息以通知的目标地址的更好地路由的主机计算机。Redirect messages are sent by routers to inform a host computer of a better route for a destination address. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#25)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#25)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#25)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property RedirectsSent As Long
public: abstract property long RedirectsSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取已发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4) 重定向消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Redirect messages that were sent.

value.span: 一个 值，指定已发送的 ICMP 重定向消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Redirect messages that were sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由路由器发送重定向消息以通知的目标地址的更好地路由的主机计算机。Redirect messages are sent by routers to inform a host computer of a better route for a destination address. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#25)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#25)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#25)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property SourceQuenchesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long SourceQuenchesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“源抑制”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Source Quench messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的“源抑制”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Source Quench messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据包已被丢弃，因为输出队列中的空间不足时，发送源抑制消息。Source Quench messages are sent when a packet was discarded because of insufficient space in the output queue. 如果数据包到达过快地进行处理，目标计算机也可以发送的源抑制消息。A destination computer can also send a Source Quench message if packets arrive too quickly to be processed. 将源抑制消息是对主机的请求返回剪切此时它将流量发送到 Internet 目标的速率。The source quench message is a request to the host to cut back the rate at which it is sending traffic to the Internet destination. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#24)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#24)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#24)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property SourceQuenchesSent As Long
public: abstract property long SourceQuenchesSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取已发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“源抑制”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Source Quench messages that were sent.

value.span: 一个 值，指定已发送的“源抑制”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Source Quench messages that were sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据包已被丢弃，因为输出队列中的空间不足时，发送源抑制消息。Source Quench messages are sent when a packet was discarded because of insufficient space in the output queue. 如果数据包到达过快地进行处理，目标计算机也可以发送的源抑制消息。A destination computer can also send a Source Quench message if packets arrive too quickly to be processed. 将源抑制消息是对主机的请求返回剪切此时它将流量发送到 Internet 目标的速率。The source quench message is a request to the host to cut back the rate at which it is sending traffic to the Internet destination. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#24)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#24)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#24)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TimeExceededMessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long TimeExceededMessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“超时”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Time Exceeded messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的 ICMP“超时”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Time Exceeded messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据包的跃点的限制确定被放弃前可转发的次数。A packet's Hop Limit determines how many times it can be forwarded before it is discarded. 每次转发数据包时，它的跃点的限制值之递减一个。Each time a packet is forwarded, its Hop Limit value is decremented by one. 当跃点限制为零时或路由器收到其跃点限制设置为零的数据包时，将丢弃数据包和数据包的源接收指示初始跃点限制已太小或路由中捕获到数据包的时间超过了消息ting 循环。When the Hop Limit reaches zero or when a router receives a packet with its Hop Limit set to zero, the packet is discarded and the source of the packet receives a Time Exceeded message indicating that the initial Hop Limit was too small or that the packet was caught in a routing loop. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#26)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#26)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#26)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TimeExceededMessagesSent As Long
public: abstract property long TimeExceededMessagesSent { long get(); };

value.span: 一个 值，指定已发送的 ICMP“超时”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Time Exceeded messages that were sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据包的跃点的限制确定被放弃前可转发的次数。A packet's Hop Limit determines how many times it can be forwarded before it is discarded. 每次转发数据包时，它的跃点的限制值之递减一个。Each time a packet is forwarded, its Hop Limit value is decremented by one. 当跃点限制为零时或路由器收到其跃点限制设置为零的数据包时，将丢弃数据包和数据包的源接收指示初始跃点限制已太小或路由中捕获到数据包的时间超过了消息ting 循环。When the Hop Limit reaches zero or when a router receives a packet with its Hop Limit set to zero, the packet is discarded and the source of the packet receives a Time Exceeded message indicating that the initial Hop Limit was too small or that the packet was caught in a routing loop. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#26)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#26)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#26)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TimestampRepliesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long TimestampRepliesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“时间戳应答”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Timestamp Reply messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的“时间戳应答”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Timestamp Reply messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时间戳请求消息会导致接收端的计算机将发送回原始计算机时间戳应答。A Timestamp Request message causes the receiving computer to send a timestamp reply back to the originating computer. 这些消息用于度量在网络上的传输速度。These messages are used to measure the transmission speed on a network. ## Examples 以下示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#28](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#28)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#28)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#28)]
